column1: A spill in some sports or to fall from a bicycle or while skiing or being capsized on a surfboard,wipeout
The mistake of occupying an illegal position on the playing field in football soccer ice hockey field hockey,offside
A sport in which participants must travel on skis,skiing
An act that violates the rules of a sport,foul
The act of preventing the opposition from scoring,save
Several contests played successively by the same teams,series
